dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I sense your presence, intruder. What purpose do you have in these dark lands?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek power to overthrow the forces of light.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ambitious, aren't we? Power is what drives us all, in the end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be stopped, even by creatures like you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from one who treads on the edge of darkness. We shall see if you can back them up.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare for a battle then, I will show you the extent of my power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Let our strength be tested in the shadows. Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense a formidable foe. Let's call a truce for now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Truce? An interesting proposal, but one that holds no place in the heart of shadows. Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I acknowledge your strength. Is there a way we can cooperate?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cooperate? Such a rare concept in these lands. But perhaps there is potential in unity.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us join forces and crush our enemies together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance of shadows, a pact of darkness. Very well, consider me your ally.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will respect your domain and avoid confrontation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect where respect is due. Your decision is wise. Ignore.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see wisdom in caution. Let us part ways without conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Caution may be your saving grace, for the shadows hold many dangers. Farewell then, wanderer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am merely passing through. No harm intended.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Passing through, yet you disturb the balance of shadows. Explain yourself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My presence is a mere coincidence, I mean no disruption.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coincidence or not, your aura bears the mark of upheaval. Be cautious, wanderer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will heed your warning and continue on my way peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful intentions or not, the shadows seldom welcome strangers. Ignore.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense hostility in your tone. Are you threatening me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Threatening? Merely a hint of the lurking dangers within these lands. Beware, traveler.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will keep my guard up and leave you to your domain.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise decision. Leave before the shadows consume you. Ignore.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you seek conflict, you shall find it. Prepare yourself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Conflict is not sought, but faced when necessary. Take heed, for the shadows are unforgiving. Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Apologies for the disturbance, I will be on my way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies hold no weight in the realm of shadows, but your departure is wise. Ignore.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to explore and learn. Your presence intrigues me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Intrigued by shadows and darkness, a peculiar interest for one such as you. What do you seek to learn?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge of the ancient magics that linger in these lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ancient magics weave a dangerous tapestry. Approach with care, seeker of knowledge.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will proceed with caution and respect for the mysteries of the dark.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Caution and respect, virtues seldom found. Your path may lead to enlightenment or despair. Ignore.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you possess knowledge to share, I am willing to listen and learn.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is power, but power comes at a price. Will you pay it, seeker?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am prepared to pay any price for the wisdom of the shadows.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A bold claim, but one that may be tested in time. Consider me your ally in the pursuit of knowledge.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Knowledge is valuable, but I will not risk my safety for it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Safety over wisdom, a choice made in the shadows. Your caution grants you favor. Ignore.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand the creatures that dwell in darkness, like yourself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding comes with time and experience, two things you may lack. Proceed cautiously, curious one.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will observe and learn from a distance, without interfering.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Observation is a skill, interference a risk. Your path of passive learning may serve you well. Ignore.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you are willing, I would like to converse more about the shadows and their inhabitants.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Conversations in shadows reveal truths and deceptions. Will you decipher them, seeker of shadows?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I accept the challenge of uncovering the mysteries within your words.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge accepted, seeker of truths. Let our words dance in the shadows of understanding. Ally.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I believe some mysteries are best left unsolved. I will depart in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise words from one who dabbles in shadows. Depart in peace, and may the darkness protect you. Ignore.
